009package imagingbook.common.morphology;
010
011import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
012
013/**
014 * Common interface for all binary morphological operators.
015 * @author WB
016 */
017public interface BinaryMorphologyOperator {
018
019        /**
020         * Applies this morphological operator to the specified image (destructively, that is, the image is modified).
021         *
022         * @param bp the image the operator is applied to
023         */
024        public void applyTo(ByteProcessor bp);
025
026}
